headline: BMO Capital Lifts Amgen (AMGN) Price Target as MariTide Outlook Strengthens
summary: Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) is included among the 15 Blue Chip Dividend Stocks to Build a Passive Income Porfolio. On December 3, BMO Capital’s Evan Seigerman increased the firm’s price target on Amgen Inc. (NASDAQ:AMGN) to $372 from $335 and reiterated an Outperform rating. The analyst noted that the data from the Maritide Phase 2 Part […]
